data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Bikaner, Rajasthan, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bikaner, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Bikaner that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 26,003 believers in Bikaner to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Bikaner, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bania Mahur people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,309,215 who are far from you in Bikaner, Rajasthan, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 26,003 believers in Bikaner and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Bikaner, Rajasthan, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Bikaner
location.people_groups_list: Burara, Pajavgir, Bania Bijabargi, Megh (Hindu traditions), Nyaria
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Burara (300), Pajavgir (2,200), Bania Bijabargi (98,000), Megh (Hindu traditions) (3,954,000), Nyaria (3,200)
